Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

    Revenue Budget & Financial Plan--Qtr1

    This dataset contains agency revenue data for Adopted, Modified and four years of Financial Plan by Revenue Class, Revenue Category and Revenue Source (Revenue Structure) or FPS Group name.
